trans-unit.source: Creates an activity to do synchronous or asynchronous batch work that can use COM+ services without needing to create a COM+ component.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'attività per eseguire le operazioni batch sincrone o asincrone che possono usare i servizi COM+ senza dover per creare un componente COM+.
Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The context associated with the activity is completely determined by a <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object.
trans-unit.target: Il contesto associato con l'attività viene completamente determinato da un <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>oggetto.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates an <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity> that is used to submit batch work to COM+ services.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>che viene utilizzato per inviare batch di lavoro per i servizi COM+.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity>

trans-unit.source: The context associated with the activity is completely determined by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object that is passed through the `cfg` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il contesto associato con l'attività viene completamente determinato dal <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>oggetto che viene passata attraverso il `cfg` parametro.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"></xref> that contains the configuration information for the services to be used.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig"> </xref> che contiene le informazioni di configurazione per i servizi da utilizzare.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.Activity"></xref> is not supported on the current platform.
Runs the specified user-defined batch work asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: Esegue le operazioni batch definito dall'utente specificato in modo asincrono.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall"></xref> object that is used to implement the batch work.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall"> </xref> oggetto utilizzato per implementare le operazioni batch.

trans-unit.source: Binds the user-defined work to the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Associa le operazioni definite dall'utente per il thread corrente.

trans-unit.source: BindToCurrentThread binds the batch work that is submitted by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.SynchronousCall%2A> or <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A> methods to the current single-threaded apartment (STA).
trans-unit.target: BindToCurrentThread associa le operazioni batch inviate dal <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.SynchronousCall%2A>o <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A>metodi per l'apartment a thread singolo (STA) corrente.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall%2A> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.SynchronousCall%2A>

trans-unit.source: BindToCurrentThread has no effect if the current thread is being run in the multithreaded apartment (MTA).
trans-unit.target: BindToCurrentThread non ha alcun effetto se il thread corrente è in esecuzione nell'apartment a thread multipli (MTA).

trans-unit.source: The current thread model is determined by the configuration of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.ThreadPool%2A> property of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> object.
trans-unit.target: Il modello di thread corrente è determinato dalla configurazione della <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.ThreadPool%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig>oggetto.</xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig> </xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.ThreadPool%2A>

trans-unit.source: Runs the specified user-defined batch work synchronously.
trans-unit.target: Esegue le operazioni batch definito dall'utente specificato in modo sincrono.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall"></xref> object that is used to implement the batch work.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.EnterpriseServices.IServiceCall"> </xref> oggetto utilizzato per implementare le operazioni batch.

trans-unit.source: Unbinds the batch work that is submitted by the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.SynchronousCall*> or <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.Activity.AsynchronousCall*> methods from the thread on which the batch work is running.
trans-unit.target: Separa le operazioni batch inviate dal <> </> *> o <> </> *> metodi dal thread in cui sono in esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: UnbindFromThread has no effect if the batch work was not previously bound to a thread.
trans-unit.target: UnbindFromThread non ha alcun effetto se le operazioni batch non è stato in precedenza associata a un thread.
